title: Is plant-based meat as healthy as animal-based meat with Christopher Gardner, PhD
description:
In Episode 167 I sit down with Stanford Professor Christopher Gardner to chat about his recent SWAP-MEAT trial that compared plant-based meat with animal-based meat.

If you're wondering how healthy plant-based burgers and sausages are, relative to their organic animal-based counterparts (yes he compared against organic animal products) then I am sure you will find this episode interesting and quite thought provoking.

We also touch on another study that compared the nutrient makeup of plant-based meat to animal-based meat.

​Hope you enjoy it.
